channel.title: [NEW] Mod Icons not working correctly

item.title: [NEW] Mod Icons not working correctly
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay this is by far the most irritating thing I’ve had in a while.

The default server has 2 crowns, and 4 rights:
0 - Player
1 - Mod - Has silver crown
2 - Admin - Has gold crown
3 - Owner - Has gold crown - same as 2

This is what I want my server to have:
0 - Player
1 - Donor - Donor symbol
2 - Mod - silver crown
3 - Admin - gold crown
4 - Owner - gold crown (maybe a custom, doesn’t matter right now)

Well, rights 0, 1, and 2 work.
but rights 3 is the same image as 2, and 4 works correctly as well.
#3 is the only broken one here.
In other words:
0 - Player
1 - Donor - Donor symbol
2 - Mod - silver crown
3 - Admin - silver crown
4 - Owner - gold crown

This is what client.java looks like (all are similar, I’m not posting 300 lines of similar code):

switch(playerRights) { case 1: modIcons[1].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; case 2: modIcons[2].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; case 3: modIcons[3].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; case 4: modIcons[3].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; }
and the mod icons:
Ignore 0, that’s used elsewhere.

Read full topic
